column4: If you've installed XFce, all you need to run to start it is: startxfce
SSH key is a security certificate. Just accept it.

I'm trying to run a FreeNX server from Ubuntu and from my test client (Windows XP), it keeps saying that authentication failed and the forum is saying I have to give it the "SSH host key"... any ideas? :(
THAT bit I wouldn't even beging to understand my friend
